name: sqlite_exec
purpose: Executes a result-less query against a given database

return.description:
This function will return a boolean result; TRUE for success or FALSE for failure.
   If you need to run a query that returns rows, see sqlite_query.The column names returned by
SQLITE_ASSOC and SQLITE_BOTH will be
case-folded according to the value of the
sqlite.assoc_case configuration
option.
